channel.title: Events on WICCA
channel.description: Recent content in Events on WICCA

item.title: ING: Hacking a Bank
item.description: Wed, Nov 27, 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM Location: ING HUB ING is inviting WICCA to their awesome open-for-all CTF! How to teach anyone to be a hacker Normally, Capture the Flag (CTF) events are organised for security enthusiasts only. This means that non-technical people are often overlooked and remain in the dark. In this session, ING will show you how you can use CTF events to teach anyone a basic level of hacking so they can defend themselves better against threats in their daily life.

item.title: Fox-IT
item.description: Wed, Oct 23, 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM Location: Fox-IT, Delft Fox-IT, one of the top Dutch security companies, is preparing an awesome event for WICCA! Stay tuned… Sign up on Meetup
